## Framework.extensions property

Container service for [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) extensions.

Signature:

```typescript
extensions: Extensions;
```

## Remarks

Extensions can be defined as a [Module](/api/bud-framework/module), which is more generic.

They can also be defined as a which is a [Module](/api/bud-framework/module) specifically yielding a .

When adding a [Module](/api/bud-framework/module) or to the container with [Extensions/add()](//bud-framework/extensions/add) it is cast to the [Extension](//bud-framework/extension) type.
